#### Flexdashboard using Plotly -- NYC Restaurant Inspections Data

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

data(rest_inspec) # loading NYC restaurants inspections data
```

The `rest_inspec` dataset contains information about NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene restaurant inspections, done annually and unannounced.
